name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Floyd Edward FILBY, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Floyd Edward FILBY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Washington County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Janette Baisley-Worstell, Asst. Public Defender, Washington, for appellant.
Herman J. Bigi, Dist. Atty., Debbie O’Dell, Asst. Dist. Atty., Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 1160
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Floyd Edward FILBY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 2, 1981.
Decided April 15, 1981.
Janette Baisley-Worstell, Asst. Public Defender, Washington, for appellant.
Herman J. Bigi, Dist. Atty., Debbie O’Dell, Asst. Dist. Atty., Washington, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
